name: Australian Same Sex Marriage Voting Simulator
name_original: Australian Same Sex Marriage Voting Simulator
description:
Did you feel jipped that you didn't get to use your phone to vote in the same sex marriage plebiscite? Or do you just want to see the real life outcome of your vote? Using out state of the art simulation technology, we can show you exactly what will happen based on your vote! Just download the app to your phone and try it out yourself!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This app was created by Jacob James, a queer video game designer from Melbourne, Australia.
@jacobjamesaus
